singleItemContent: Please describe your hometown a little
What is your hometown well-known for?
Is that a big City or a small place?
How long have you been living there?
Do you think you will continue living there for a long time?
How has your town changed over the last 20 years?
Describe a piece of technology that you feel difficult to use
And explain how you feel about it
1. What technology do people currently use?
2. Why do big companies introduce new products frequently?
3. Why are people so keen on buying iPhone even though they havent changed much from one to the next?
